data.product_title: Blue Buffalo Life Protection Formula Adult Dry Dog Food, Helps Build and Maintain Strong Muscles, Made with Natural Ingredients, Chicken & Brown Rice Recipe, 30-lb. Bag
about_product: REAL CHICKEN FIRST: Blue Buffalo's premium dog food features high quality deboned chicken as the primary ingredient; brown rice, cranberries and vegetables for a balanced diet; and high quality protein that promotes strong muscles
HIGH QUALITY NATURAL FOOD: BLUE's natural dry dog food is made with premium ingredients and contains no chicken or poultry by-products, corn, wheat or soy
THE PERFECT BALANCE OF FLAVOR AND NUTRITION: Formulated with essential proteins and carbs for energy needs and Omega-3 & 6 fatty acids to promote healthy skin and coat

CONTAINS IMMUNITY-BOOSTING LIFESOURCE BITS: LifeSource Bits contain a precise blend of antioxidants, vitamins and minerals to support immune system health, life stage needs and a healthy oxidative balance
Contains: One (1) 30-lb bag of BLUE Life Protection Formula Natural Chicken and Brown Rice Flavor

ENHANCED IMAGERY: We have enhanced our digital product packaging to highlight our products’ ingredients and essential benefits; while the physical packaging will differ slightly, all information is accurate
data.product_description: Formulated for the health and well-being of adult dogs, BLUE Life Protection Formula Chicken and Brown Rice dry dog food is made with the finest natural ingredients enhanced with vitamins, minerals, and other nutrients. It’s a high-quality, balanced recipe you can both feel great about. Designed to help your dog thrive, this formula starts with real chicken and contains no chicken (or poultry) by-product meals, no corn, wheat, or soy, and no artificial flavors or preservatives. Like all BLUE dry foods, BLUE Life Protection Formula includes exclusive, antioxidant-rich LifeSource Bits to support a healthy immune system in your adult dog. Give your dog the balanced nutrition of BLUE Life Protection Formula today. BLUE Life Protection Formula is brought to you by Blue Buffalo, the leader in natural pet food. Blue Buffalo makes premium-quality pet foods featuring real meat, fruit, and vegetables. Love them like family. Feed them like family.

product_information.Directions: Up to 15 lbs. 1/2 – 1 ¼ cups* 16 to 25 lbs. 1 ¼ – 1 ¾ cups* 26 to 40 lbs. 1 ¾ – 2 ½ cups* 41 to 60 lbs. 2 ½ – 3 ½ cups* 61 to 80 lbs. 3 ½ – 4 ¼ cups* 81 to 100 lbs. 4 ¼ – 5 cups* Over 100 lbs. Feed 5 cups* plus ½ cup for each additional 20 lbs. *Use a standard 8-oz. measuring cup. Note: Individual dog's requirements may vary due to age, breed, environment, and activity level. Adjust food as required to maintain optimal body condition, and ask your veterinarian if you are unsure.
product_information.Warranty Description: If you have a question that needs immediate attention, please call (800) 919-2833.
product_information.Care Instructions: Be sure to have a clean dish of cool, fresh water available at all times.
product_information.Included Components: Contains one (1) 30 lb. Bag of BLUE Life Protection Formula Adult Dry Dog Food, Chicken and Brown Rice

data.customers_say: Customers find this dog food to be of good quality, with healthy ingredients and no artificial flavors or preservatives. The food receives positive feedback for its taste, with dogs loving the chicken or turkey flavors, and customers report no stomach problems and improved digestive health. While some dogs eat it with no complaints, others refuse to eat it at all. Some customers report their dogs having diarrhea after consuming it.

top_reviews.review_comment: Wanted to see how my dog would do before committing to a bigger bag. The first thing I noticed was the ingredient list with real chicken as the first ingredient, no by product meals, and no corn, wheat, or soy. That gave me confidence, it was starting on the right foot. 🙂 My dog took to it right away, no hesitation at the bowl, and the transition from his old food was smooth. After about a week his coat looked shinier and his energy stayed consistent without any stomach issues. The kibble size was easy for him to chew and I liked that the bag was resealable which kept it fresh. 🙂 The only drawback is the price. It is on the higher end for a kibble in this size and I know there are other brands that offer similar nutrition for less. That said the quality feels solid and the trial bag is a smart way to test it out before making a bigger investment. 🙂❤️
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: This is my preferred brand, and my dog loves it. He enjoys all the varieties—beef, chicken, and especially the Wilderness line. I love that Blue Buffalo uses quality ingredients and really cares about pet nutrition. Plus, their Subscribe & Save deals on Amazon make it easy and affordable to keep his bowl full with the foods he loves. Highly recommended!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Great product - my dog loves it
top_reviews.review_comment: Been feeding this to my dog for a while now and he cleans the bowl every time. Coat looks good, energy’s up, and no stomach issues like he had with cheaper brands. It’s not the cheapest bag out there, but you get what you pay for. Solid stuff that actually makes a difference.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Great dog food for picky doggos
top_reviews.review_comment: My dog is a little punk when it comes to eating dog food so I had to try different dog food brands every time he refused to eat. He absolutely loves eating this and had no stomach issues the first time he tried it unlike some other brands. I will definitely be ordering always and forever till he decides that he wants something else!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: Have had my three dogs on the adult chicken for a few years now. Out of the three, only have one picky eater and she gobbles this kibble up! Food quality seems consistent and the dogs continue to have nice shiny coats would recommend this food to other dog owners. Currently enrolled in subscribe and save receiving 2 bags a month. This saves me about $24/month compared to purchasing at the store. Totally worth it.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: Product is great. But the Amazon driver left them outside of my gate instead of bringing it on to the porch! It was soaking wet from the rain and the boxes were crumbling! It was a hot mess
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: My husky loves this food. He likes the little bit & it’s easy to chew. Great product & great flavor 😋😋😋
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Great product,  lots of Amazon shipping delays
top_reviews.review_comment: Love the product for my dogs and I buy one more premium brand and mix them and my dogs are healthy, playful (even the seniors), anf their coats just shine. But watch Amazon shipping even if you have subscribe and save, lots of delays and back orders!!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2025

top_reviews_global.review_title: 又食べれるようになったこと
top_reviews_global.review_comment: 前にもブルーを食べてたので又食べれるようになってよかったです。モリモリパクパク食べてます。
Amazonさんがこのドッグフードを揃えていて、良かったです。 アメリカから一時帰国した愛犬のフードですので、現地で食べているものと 同一のものが必要なためです。
Ya he pedido varias veces y siempre llega a tiempo y en perfectas condiciones, excelentes croquetas para mis mascotas
top_reviews_global.review_author: Ya he comprado varias veces y siempre llega a tiempo y en perfectas condiciones, excelentes croquetas para mis mascotas

top_reviews_global.review_title: Comida para perro de buena calidad
top_reviews_global.review_comment: Nos gusta esta marca. Antes la podías conseguir en cualquier tienda, pero pronto la descontinuaron en nuestro pais, por lo tanto ahora estamos buscando donde comprarla y esta opción resultó muy bien. Estamos contentos porque llegó en tiempo y forma. Y el precio aunque no es el mismo que antes, no está tan caro.

top_reviews_global.review_title: Buen producto, pero el tamaño fue un cambio importante
top_reviews_global.review_comment: Las croquetas tienen tamaño grande, nuestra perrita tardo algo de tiempo en acostumbrarse a masticar bien el alimento, algunas veces medio se ahogaba, pero parece que le gusta el sabor y la consistencia

data.product_title: Purina ONE Dry Dog Food Lamb and Rice Formula - 31.1 lb. Bag
about_product: Natural dog food with added vitamins, minerals, and nutrients has a Purina ONE SmartBlend of high-quality ingredients, including quality carbohydrate sources, that helps support dog nutritional needs
Is Purina ONE good for dogs? Real lamb is the first ingredient in this high protein dog food kibble, helping supply protein for dogs that helps supports strong muscles, including his healthy heart
This lamb dog food formula supports a microbiome balance and is made with prebiotic fiber for dogs to help maintain your dog's gut health and provide immune support
Natural sources of glucosamine for dogs support joint health, vitamins A and E promote bright eyes, and omega-6 fatty acids, vitamins and minerals nourish a shiny coat and healthy skin

Is Purina ONE made in the USA? Our red bag dog food is crafted in Purina-owned, U.S. facilities and has a combo of protein-rich, tender morsels and crunchy bites full of irresistible flavor dogs adore
data.product_description: Feed your canine the SmartBlend of high-quality ingredients in Purina ONE Natural Lamb and Rice Formula With Added Vitamins, Minerals and Nutrients dry dog food. What are the ingredients in Purina ONE? Real lamb is the first ingredient in our adult dog food with rice, providing protein for dogs that helps support strong muscles. Plus, this natural dog food includes premium Purina ONE dog food ingredients and added vitamins, minerals and nutrients to provide complete and balanced nutrition for adult dogs. Made with prebiotic fiber, this high protein dry dog food for skin and coat care is also highly digestible and formulated to support a microbiome balance. We add calcium to the crunchy kibble to support his strong teeth, too. Pick up that familiar red bag to see the differences this Purina ONE lamb and rice dog food can make in your dog, and look for the full Purina ONE feeding chart, calories per serving, dog food ingredients list and instructions on changing dog food.

product_information.Directions: Factors, such as a dog's metabolism, breed size, activity level, age and whether the dog is spayed or neutered, will affect the amount of Purina ONE needed to maintain an ideal body condition. The pet experts at Purina have provided the feeding amounts indicated as a starting point. If you find that your dog is losing weight or becomes overweight when fed these amounts, please adjust accordingly. To help your dog maintain an ideal body condition, monitor your dog's weight on a regular basis, making sure that your dog’s ribs are easily felt and the waist is visible when viewed from above. Maintaining an ideal body condition can impact your dog’s lifelong health.
product_information.Included Components: One (1) 31.1 lb. Bag - Purina ONE Natural Dry Dog Food, SmartBlend Lamb & Rice Formula

data.customers_say: Customers find this dog food to be of good quality and excellent value for money, with their pets loving it, particularly appreciating the lamb and chicken pieces. The food receives positive feedback for its taste, with one customer noting the dark tender meaty morsels mixed in, and its health benefits, with one review mentioning it's super healthy for liver function. Customers report that their dogs eat it easily and without digestive issues, with many noting it works wonders for sensitive stomachs. However, some customers report that their dogs became very sick after eating it.

top_reviews.review_title: A Lifesaver for Our Allergy-Prone Pup!
top_reviews.review_comment: Purina ONE Lamb and Rice Formula has been an absolute game-changer for our rescue dog, Jake. He has a long list of allergy issues, and after trying so many different foods, this is the only one that truly works for him. No more upset tummy, no more itching—just a happy, healthy pup who actually loves his food! Jake gets so excited at mealtime, and it’s such a relief to know we’re giving him something that’s both safe and delicious. The price is fantastic for the quality, and we love the convenience of the subscription option—it ensures we never run out, which is a huge plus. If your dog has sensitivities or you're just looking for a high-quality, affordable food that dogs genuinely enjoy, I can’t recommend this enough. Thank you, Purina, for keeping our boy healthy and tail-wagging happy!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Best price and quality I have found!
top_reviews.review_comment: Good stuff - Lowest price I have found especially if you save and subscribe. We have a labradoodle - Seems to have a sensitive stomach and this stuff doesn't mess with him as other brands have in the past. He actually enjoys it.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: Great dog food . It’s a little pricey but works great for my French bulldog
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: My dogs like this food. It is much cheaper than blue buffalo dog food, and my dogs are just as happy.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: My dogs are very picky and this seems to be the only brand they will consistently eat. The price is also very good considering everything has gone up quite a bit in the last few years. I only give it a 4 because most places could crest with better ingredients :)
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: I switched my girl to this Purina ONE after her vet suggested trying a chicken and rice formula for her sensitive stomach. She was having some digestive issues with her old food and this has made a huge difference. First thing I noticed is she actually gets excited about meal time now. Before she would kind of pick at her food but with this stuff she cleans her bowl every time. The kibble size seems perfect for her too - not too big, not too small. Her stomach issues cleared up within like two weeks of switching. No more weird digestive problems or upset tummies. She seems way more comfortable after eating now. But the biggest change is her coat. It's gotten so shiny and soft since we started this food. People keep commenting on how healthy she looks. Even her energy level seems better, though that could just be because her stomach feels better. The ingredients look good too - real chicken is the first ingredient and I can actually pronounce most of the stuff on the list. No weird fillers or mystery meat byproducts. Price is reasonable for the quality. Not the cheapest dog food out there but way more affordable than some of the boutique brands that cost twice as much. The bag size lasts a good amount of time even though she's a decent sized dog with a good appetite. Easy to store and the bag seals well to keep it fresh. Only minor complaint is that it can be a little dusty when you pour it, but that's pretty typical for dry kibble. Overall really happy with this food. When you find something that works for your dog's health and they actually like eating it, you stick with it. Definitely buying again when this bag runs out. Makes me feel good knowing she's getting good nutrition without breaking the bank.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: It's what my dogs love the most
top_reviews.review_comment: I have multiple dogs in different sizes and ages. The ingredients are quality protein and the chow down at dinner time. They don't have stomach issues and we feel safe feeding them Purina One chicken. Heavy bags are durable and maintain the product well. Recommend this dog food.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: Fast shipping! Great quality.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2025

top_reviews_global.review_comment: Los perros lo consumieron con gusto, el sabor les resultó agradable y se ve cambio en el pelaje, para bien
El producto llegó rápido, muy bien empacado, a tiempo. Excelente Calidad!

data.product_title: Pedigree Complete Nutrition Adult Dry Dog Food, Roasted Chicken & Vegetable Flavor, 18 lb. Bag
about_product: Complete and Balanced: Pedigree Complete Nutrition Adult Dry Dog Food, Roasted Chicken & Vegetable Flavor is 100% complete and balanced food for adult dogs, bringing a nutritious meal to your pet
Supports Everyday Health: This dry dog food recipe is made with 36 vitamins, minerals, and amino acids to support your dog’s health and vitality
High Quality Protein Dog Food: Supports lean muscle with high-quality protein

Highly Digestible Dog Food Recipe: Pedigree Complete Nutrition, Adult Dry Dog Food, Roasted Chicken & Vegetable Flavor is made with only natural flavors and includes prebiotic fibers to support healthy digestion
Supports Healthy Skin and Coat: This dry dog food recipe is enriched with Omega 6 Fatty Acid and Zinc to help nourish a healthy skin and coat
data.product_description: Dogs bring out the good in us. Pedigree dog food brings out the good in them. Express your love for your dog by serving Pedigree Complete Nutrition Adult Dry Dog Food, Roasted Chicken & Vegetable Flavor recipe. Made with only natural flavors for great taste in every bowl, this healthy dog food recipe supports their everyday health and natural vitality and is formulated with 36 vitamins, minerals, and amino acids. It also contains high-quality protein to support lean muscles, prebiotic fiber to support healthy digestion, and Omega 6 Fatty Acid and Zinc to help nourish a healthy skin and coat. This recipe is made in the USA with the finest ingredients from around the world. With no high fructose corn syrup, artificial flavors, or added sugars, Pedigree Complete Nutrition Adult Dry Dog Food, Roasted Chicken & Vegetable Flavor shows your dog that you care and have great taste.

product_information.Directions: Recommended Daily: Feeding Guide: For Adult Dogs* Weight of Adult Dog Cups per Day Mix With Pouch Up to 10 LBS 1/2 to 3/4 Replace ¼ cup for each 10 to 25 LBS 3/4 to 1 2/3 3.5 oz of Pedigree Pouch 25 to 50 LBS 1 2/3 to 2 3/4 50 to 75 LBS 2 3/4 to 3 3/4 75 to 100 LBS 3 3/4 to 4 3/4 add 1/3 cup for every 10 LBS over 100 LBS 1 cup = 8 oz measuring cup, 1 can = 13.2 oz Mixing With Canned Replace 1/2 cup for each 1/2 can of Pedigree Choice CutsIn Gravy. *An individual dog's requirements may differ from this guide. Store in a cool, dry place. Keep fresh water available. For more information, visit www.pedigree.com. Transitioning to Our Food: Gradually mix in the new food over a 4 day period, increasing the amount of Pedigree Adult Dog Food each day.
product_information.Included Components: PEDIGREE Complete Nutrition Adult Dry Dog Food Roasted Chicken, Rice & Vegetable Flavor Dog Kibble, 18 lb. Bonus Bag

data.product_title: Purina ONE Chicken and Rice Formula Dry Dog Food - 16.5 lb. Bag
about_product: Purina ONE chicken and rice dog food offers a microbiome balance and a SmartBlend of high-quality ingredients, including prebiotic fiber for dogs, to help your pal live up to his full potential
With real chicken as the first ingredient, this high quality dog food supports your dog's strong muscles, including his healthy heart, and has high-quality carbohydrate sources for healthy energy
This high protein dry dog food for skin and coat care is highly digestible and has omega-6 fatty acids, vitamins and minerals, plus four antioxidant sources for a strong immune system
Is Purina ONE good for dogs? Purina red bag dog food provides 100 percent complete and balanced nutrition for adult dogs and features natural glucosamine sources to promote joint health for dogs
Is Purina ONE made in the USA? This digestive care dog food with glucosamine for dogs blends crunchy bites and tender, meaty morsels for extra yum and is crafted in Purina-owned, U.S. facilities
data.product_description: Serve meals inspired by the science of nature when you pick up that familiar red bag of Purina ONE Natural Chicken and Rice Formula With Added Vitamins, Minerals and Nutrients adult dog food. What are the ingredients in Purina ONE? We choose our SmartBlend of Purina ONE dog food ingredients for a purpose. The high protein dog food features high-quality sources of protein for dogs, such as real chicken as the first ingredient, to help support strong muscles, including a healthy heart. With 100 percent nutrition and 0 percent fillers, this natural dog food has the added vitamins, minerals and nutrients adult dogs need. Plus, the adult dog food includes prebiotic fiber for gut health and immune support and vitamins A and E to support bright eyes. With added calcium, the crunchy dog food kibble helps support strong teeth, too. Check out the Purina ONE chicken dog food bag for the Purina ONE feeding chart, calories per serving, dog food ingredients list and instructions on changing dog food.

product_information.Directions: Please see product packaging for details.
product_information.Warranty Description: See the Difference Guaranteed. We're so sure you'll see a healthy difference in your dog, we're offering a money-back guarantee. If this product has not met your expectations, we will gladly refund your purchase price. Cut out the "Best If Used By" date box and weight circle from this bag. Send within 60 days of date on receipt along with your original purchase receipt with the price circled, a brief explanation of why you were dissatisfied with the product, and your name and street address (P.O. Box not accepted) to: Satisfaction Guarantee, PO Box 1326, Wilkes Barre, PA 18703. Offer good only in USA, APOs and FPOs.

data.customers_say: Customers find this dog food to be of good quality and value, particularly noting it's cost-effective for feeding multiple dogs. The food receives positive feedback for its taste, chicken content, and health benefits, with customers appreciating the chicken pieces and noting it provides all-around nutrition. While some customers report their dogs enjoy eating it without digestive issues, others mention their dogs won't eat it or experience diarrhea. The shelf life receives mixed reviews, with some customers reporting fresh deliveries while others received expired products.

data.product_title: Hill's Science Diet Adult 1-6 Perfect Weight Dry Dog Food, Chicken & Brown Rice, 25 lb. Bag
data.product_byline: Visit the Hill's Science Diet Store
about_product: Safe & effective weight loss with visible results within 10 weeks
Healthy weight maintenance & long lasting weight support
Lean muscle support
Made in the USA with global ingredients you can trust
#1 Veterinarian Recommended
data.product_description: Putting your grown dog on a calorie restricted diet can be difficult for you and your canine companion. That's why Hill's Science Diet Perfect Weight Adult Dog Food provides delicious, breakthrough weight management nutrition that your full grown dog can enjoy. With protein for lean muscle maintenance, and clinically proven results in just 10 weeks, this weight control dog food made with natural ingredients is the perfect addition to your adult dog's bowl. This healthy weight dog food is formulated with decades of cutting-edge research to be a great-tasting meal your grown dog can truly enjoy. There’s more to love with the new look of Science Diet. Some of our products also have new names, new kibble shapes & new formulas.

product_information.Directions: Please see package for complete feeding instructions. Adjust feeding amounts as necessary to maintain optimal weight. If you are unsure, ask your veterinarian. New to this food? Mix increasing amounts of your pet's new food with decreasing amounts of the old food over a 7 day period. Keep fresh water available at all times! Your pet's nutritional needs may change as they age. Ask your vet at every checkup.
product_information.Model Name: Hill's Science Diet Adult Perfect Weight Chicken Recipe Dry Dog Food, 25 lb bag

data.customers_say: Customers find this dog food to be of good quality and effective for weight management, particularly for Labrador and Corgi breeds. The food receives positive feedback for its taste and health benefits, with one customer noting improvements in their dog's coat. While some customers report no stomach issues and consider it good value for money, others mention it made their dogs extremely sick and consider it pricey. The size of the bag receives mixed reviews.

top_reviews.review_title: Keeps my Dachshund in perfect weight
top_reviews.review_comment: Great quality, weight management, cero allergies.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: My dog loves this food . Has been eating it for years.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Has been very helpful for my dog
top_reviews.review_comment: I have a miniature Pinscher and she is a lot taller than most min pins. However she has struggled in the past with being just slightly overweight. She also struggled with a case of pancreatitis. With some lifestyle changes things got better. But then all of a sudden we noticed she was having allergic reactions to the dry food we had been feeding her prior which was another weight management food by another brand. When I looked at the bag I realized they had changed their formula and did not advertise it on the bag and it contained one of the ingredients she is allergic to. I was hesitant to go back to hills science diet because she did not like it the very first time we tried it however this time she absolutely loves it. She has been high energy, enjoys the taste ( if she can even taste it she's like a Hoover) and her bowel movements are much better. Purchasing it on Amazon was much cheaper than getting it from the vet. Overall this is a quality dog food that I suggest to anyone whose dog is having health problems as Hill science diet has different types of dry food for all kinds of problems like chronic diarrhea or overall health problems and aging. The ability to start out with a 4 lb bag to see how she would handle it as opposed to a 75 lb bag from my vet is amazing. This also costs much less than big pet store retailers.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2024

top_reviews.review_title: Great product to middle to large breeds and for older dogs
top_reviews.review_comment: Great product for middle to large breeds and for older dogs. I have a Labradoodle, and she weighs around 47 pounds, so she falls between medium and large. However, this breed tends to be prone to weight gain. So this choice of food was perfect. Since I use it, the vet always comments on how well she is doing with her weight. The ingredients are also good. Friends of mine who prefer to use more natural sources see no difference in their dogs' results compared with mine, and this diet. Coat, weight, etc. When she does #2, the size and texture are just those of a healthy dog. I like to dump it into a canister to keep it dry, but the size of the pellets makes it easy to pick and always have the right measurement for her weight.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: My go to brand and selection
top_reviews.review_comment: This is all I’ll use from my dogs. I love them more than most people. If there was something better, I would buy it. I have used this for many many years and find that it is the right combination of caloric intake, nutrition, and quality. I really don’t care what it costs so while there may be cheaper brands out there, I don’t really care. I will stick with this as I’ve discussed it with enough vets who concur that it is the best on the common market.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: Good food my dog liked it. Just a little expensive for me.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: This is an update. The weight is coming off. I had taken him off of Ĥills perfect weight because of what i thought were stomach issues, but he gained almost 20 lbs. In 6 months. After approximately 3 weeks back on, I can see a difference just in the way he looks, and no stomach issues. He was 135 lbs at the vets office and he suggested I put him back on Hills perfect weight as he had gained so much weight. This food does work. He is energetic and is looking like the weight is coming off.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: I had tried adding green beans to my lab mix’s regular dog food, decreasing his food intake, and taking short walks to promote weight loss. He had prescriptions for carprofen and glucosamine to help with joint pain. Unfortunately, none of it made a noticeable difference—he remained chunky, lethargic, and in constant discomfort. After switching to Hill's Perfect Weight, everything changed. He finally lost weight and I didn't have to cut the amount of food he was getting. He no longer needs daily pain medication, only taking it occasionally as needed, and his energy has significantly increased. I will warn you, though, the food has a very strong smell!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2025

top_reviews_global.review_title: Great diet food for my lab!
top_reviews_global.review_comment: I've had my lab on this food for just over a month. She's slimming down, but not drastically - which means this formula of food has the dogs health at heart. It's a nice, gradual weight loss and she loves the taste of it, which helps too. I'll keep her on this food now and would recommend it.
My dogs love this food. It’s gentle on their tummies and maintains their health. It is pricey and i would hope for it to be more affordable but you get what you pay for I guess.
My dog likes it I got the bigger kibbles I have a mini dachshund but he likes these better than the small kibbles
My dog loves the food so much, and she started on loosing weight after 4 weeks. Recommended if you are looking for good quality, healthy food with a decent price!
